Sentencas: In the realm of fuel cell technologies, solid oxide fuel cells are distinguished by their efficiency and potential for sustainable energy conversion.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, controlling these cells poses significant challenges due to the inherent nonlinearity of their output voltage characteristics.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The current study introduces an improved model-free control strategy, designed to enhance the performance of fuel cell output voltage without reliance on traditional model-dependent control.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Central to this strategy is developing a beta\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\beta $$\end{document} variable model-free control mechanism, leveraging online estimation based on the forgotten recursive least square method to obtain better dynamic regulation.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the integration of a fractional-order PI control, underpinned by extended state observer, estimates effectively unknown dynamics and optimizes the tracking process.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The control structure is further augmented by the incorporation of a fractional-order adaptive sliding mode control to reduce observer estimation errors and bolster robustness across all operational scenarios.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The stability of the proposed closed-loop system is validated using the Lyapunov stability theorem.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Simulation results demonstrate the controller's efficacy in accurately tracking the output voltage, outperforming the conventional regulators.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Notable achievements include considerable enhancements in the system's response characteristics, such as achieving a precise response without any overshoot, a rapid settling time, and a negligible steady-state error.
Titulo: Adaptive data-driven controller based on fractional calculus for solid oxide fuel cell
